body_html:
Not really. I was busy finishing my thesis, which I just presented today :)

Hopefully, I can finish it by the end of this or the next week, with the main issue being the tests themselves. I started using state_is_tuple in my project so that bit works. Also, still unsure of how to deal with accepting only the proper cell types.

body:
Not really. I was busy finishing my thesis, which I just presented today :)

Hopefully, I can finish it by the end of this or the next week, with the main issue being the tests themselves. I started using `state_is_tuple` in my project so that bit works. Also, still unsure of how to deal with accepting only the proper cell types.
